text:
Hi to the community!

I am currently experiencing some issues with the page publishing API. I'd like to change the domain and url-slug for a batch of one of our customers web pages.

Unfortunately, all the changes don't make their way thru to HubSpot although I am receiving a 200 response, when using the endpoint for updating a page.

Anyone here experiencing the same issues?
Hi Andreas, it has worked for me using this: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/put_pages_page_id>
this is the error, and it happens with all authors who have multi-language

Hi everyone! I am facing a problem with Contact creation API. In our project, we are considering (email, phone) combination to check uniqueness for a Customer, but while creating a Contact via API on HubSpot for respective Customers, it doesn't create a second Contact with same email even though the phone is different.
There is no way to change the uniqueness check for Contacts on HubSpot.
Anyone tried to solve similar issue?
<@U2H3TT8F2> is there any chance you could guide me on this? Thanks in advance :slightly_smiling_face:
Is there a way to retrieve past versions of deal stages on a deal with the new API?
I only see it on the v1 API (and it doesn't work for retrieve by ID)
You may have to resort to a different solution if you aren't able to add delays to Microsoft flow.
Yeah, deduplication by email seems to be unavoidable.

Quick question — Setting up a fresh site and wondering if the site search api, limited to the blog posts, will fetch any data if the main domain isnt set up yet? Ive got an ajax call that is responding with a 200 status code but doesnt feed me any blog posts with a search param that should hit all of them. Wondering if it also just takes a bit of time for them to index properly?

hi there. is it possible to get data using this url variable s*ubmissionGuid*=4ed6e975-aae1-4500-a7e2-41ab659bbf4c . This is having submitted a form and been redirected to an external page. I wanna get info there. Thanks in advance!
